question_text: Which of the following actions involve VM snapshot functionality? (Select all that apply)
answer_options: Saving the VM's current memory and disk state
Backing up all host system data
Reverting the VM after failed updates
Migrating VM to another physical server
correct_answer: Saving the VM's current memory and disk state
Reverting the VM after failed updates
explanation: Snapshots store the current VM configuration and allow you to roll back after issues. They do not back up the host or perform migrations.
